name: Sala - Beefcake
text:
2 Level 5 "Sala -" Monsters
Once per turn, whilst this card has Xyz Material: You can target 1 card on the field; banish it, and if you do, you lose 1000 LP. You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card to activate one of these effects;
· Banish 2 cards on the field, including one you control.
· Banish a card from either GY or banish this card and shuffle a card from either GY into the Deck.
You can only use this effect of "Sala - Beefcake" once per turn.
